CustomField.description: This field is used to set the correct currency code on the client/subject object.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Total_Debt_Currency__c, "AUD - Australian Dollar", "AUD", "EUR - Euro", "EUR", "GBP - British Pound", "GBP", "HKD - Hong Kong Dollar", "HKD", "JPY - Japanese Yen", "JPY", "USD - U.S. Dollar", "USD", "")
CustomField.label: TotalDebtCurrencyCode
